item.description:
Join with Buxton/Hollis/Gorham members and other "westerlings" for another great movie night and discussion. The selection this month is "Introduction to Permaculture Design" with designer Geoff Lawton, where he "...takes you into the world of Permaculture Design and introduces you to a new way of looking at the world. Learn how to apply your design skills by observing, analyzing and harmonizing with the patterns of Nature. Discover the theory and then see the examples in action in this unique video. Essential information for anyone interested in learning more about Permaculture and how they can apply it in their daily lives to create sustainable abundance."

 

 

6:30 Potluck Supper (bring a dish to share and your own potluck kit - plate, bowl, cup, utensils, napkin)

7:00 Announcements and Movie

8:30-9:00-ish Discussion and Closing

Hope to see you there!

For those with allergies, please be aware there are cats in the house (who will probably hide upstairs for the evening!)

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Buxton/Hollis/Gorham movie night: Introduction to Permaculture Design
